note:
ADHDer | Aspiring Nature Photographer | Dog/Cat Dad | Perpetual Token Straighty

I like to talk about ADHD/neurodivergence, Utah/US politics, sports (Jazz/Utes/Red Sox), microcontrollers, FOSS, etc.

I also post my OC photos. Original photos are licensed CC-BY-NC-SA. Basically, use my photos however you like so long as you don't try and make money off of them, and maintain that license for derivatives. If you like one of my photos, please reach out to me and I'll gladly send a full-res copy.
